content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'synapse-nyt-cosmos-db'))
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [synapse-nyt-cosmos-db]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'MU8FbAMlpQ0PL7efJ4MlWLDOcSYJsiUdtB70eVS8uybpSGkKXiRetg1AGA7pKuarh7S1fM8p27KdcUeGuOU1fQ=='
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=synapse-nyt-cosmos-db;Database=nytdb',
                OBJECT = 'Heartbeat',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'synapse-nyt-cosmos-db'
) AS [Heartbeat]
